[http://www.motorolasolutions.com/web/Business/Products/Wireless%20LAN%20Devices/WLAN%20Access%20Points/AP8232/_Documents/_StaticFiles/AP8232_Spec_Sheet.pdf Spec sheet] Additional expansion modules noted in the spec. sheet are... *'''Intrusion detection''': MOD-8132-60015-WW *'''Light sensor''': MOD-8132-0001D-WW *'''4G LTE backhaul''': Sierra Wireless 313U
